events.description: The release of preliminary estimates for Hungary's industrial production for December 2025.

facts.fact_text: Industrial production in Hungary grew by 1.8% year-on-year in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: Industrial production in Hungary grew by 1.8% year-on-year in December 2025, rebounding from a 5.4% decline in the previous month

facts.fact_text: December 2025 marked the first growth in Hungarian industrial activity since February 2024.

evidences.evidence_text: This marked the first growth in industrial activity since February 2024

facts.fact_text: Industrial output rose by 0.9% on a seasonally and working-day adjusted monthly basis in December.

evidences.evidence_text: On a seasonally and working-day adjusted monthly basis, industrial output rose by 0.9% compared with the previous month

facts.fact_text: The volume of industrial production for the full year of 2025 was 3.2% lower than in 2024.

evidences.evidence_text: For the full year of 2025, the volume of industrial production was 3.2% lower than in 2024.

claims.claim_text: The growth in industrial activity was driven by increases in production volumes across most manufacturing sub-sectors.
claims.author: Preliminary estimates

evidences.evidence_text: driven by notable increases in production volumes across most of the manufacturing sub-sectors.

evidence.evidence_text: driven by notable increases in production volumes across most of the manufacturing sub-sectors.
This marked the first growth in industrial activity since February 2024
